channel.title: *Auto Cache Download*
channel.description:
Hey guys I need help with my auto cache downloader. How do I make it so if the user that is running my server doesn't have the correct cache auto download's it from a ftp site and it makes the folder with the correct name into the C:\ drive and unzip's it there.
In example: Download's it to C:\Uses\*\Downloads unzips it to C:\DSPK
I have TeamViewer if necessary.
I am 317 [PI]
Using RuneFX client server and cache.

item.title: *Auto Cache Download*
item.dc:creator: @okya okya
item.description:
@okya wrote:

What do I change and what do I change it to. Sorry for bugging you.

Read full topic

item.title: *Auto Cache Download*
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

zip the files inside the cache, not the actual folder.

Read full topic
